translation.en: It took six years, but I finally finished building my dream house. Uh-huh.
translation.ko: 드디어 6년 만에 꿈에 그리던 집을 지었어!

translation.en: [Buddy and Darnell] Ka-Boom!
Sorry. I'm late for a race and I needed a shortcut.
Buddy Thunderstruck!
I promise to fix that hole.
[laughs] Don't be silly!
I'm keeping that hole. Now you get to that race.
translation.ko: 가보로 남길 거야 어서 경주에나 가

translation.en: If I do say so myself, that is a dang nice hole.
translation.ko: 내 입으로 말하긴 그렇지만 멋진 구멍이긴 해요

translation.en: -It's a dang great hole, Buddy. -[engine revving]
Wow! Buddy Thunderstruck just drove through my hand-built dream house.
translation.ko: 버디 썬더스트럭이 손수 지은 꿈의 집을 뚫고 지나가 줬어!

translation.en: -[crashing] -[siren stops]
Sheriff Cannonball. Buddy is speeding and I have crashed into a love seat.
translation.ko: 캐논볼 보안관님, 버디가 속도를 위반했는데 전 여기 끼었습니다

translation.en: I repeat, I have--
I'm here, Hoisenberry!
Sorry, Sheriff.
Sooner or later, when Buddy's luck runs out,
I'll be there to throw his butt in jail.
Then I shall dance like no one is watching.
translation.ko: 그럼 누가 보든 말든 신나게 춤을 춰야지

translation.en: Darnell, after we win tonight, let's do somethin' real fun.
translation.ko: 오늘 경주에서 이기면 진짜 재밌게 놀자

translation.en: We could refill my ice cube trays?
No. Wanna recycle some cans?
Nah. Wanna make scented candles?
Nah. Wanna cut our toenails?
Nah.
Darnell, it has occurred to me all of our ideas are just terrible.
translation.ko: 다넬, 죄다 지루한 계획인 것 같다

translation.en: Here we go, race fans! Nick the New Guy here.
It's time to get in the race,
even though fan favorite Buddy Thunderstruck is a no-show,
forcing us to watch a bunch of back-markers in granny gear.
Talk about losers!
Yo, Pops! I'm in first place, yo!
-Pay attention, ya bloated tick! -[crowd chanting] Buddy!
Tex Arkana Jr. is the new cat's pajamas.
[both] Ka-Boom!
[Nick over PA] The race has started!
And Buddy Thunderstruck, a true gasser, has made it just in the nick of time.
Whoo-wee! My heart's racing faster than the time I got caught peeing in the public pool.
translation.ko: 수영장에 오줌 누다 잡혔을 때보다 떨립니다

translation.en: Which was just this morning.
Ooh! Let's visit the mystery spot.
That spot is just a stain on some guy's shirt.
translation.ko: 그런 데는 누군가의 옥에 티 같아

translation.en: Nice guy, though. Creepy but nice.
Ultimate Robot Fighting?
-[tires screech] -[Buddy] It's not that ultimate.
Robots just slap each other and giggle.
[Darnell] Apple picking?
Darnell? Apple picking? Really?
Put it in the "maybe" pile.
[Nick over PA] Buddy Thunderstruck is ridin' that fence for pole position.
He's schoolin' those other drivers like they're little babies
with baby legs that can't reach the gas pedals.
And now he's neck and neck with Tex Arkana Jr.!
Hey, how you doin', Little Tex?
Worry about yourself, bro!
Aw, y'all are just a bunch of bricklayers!
-Ka-Boom! -[cheering]
Fart nugget! I hate me some Buddy Thunderstruck.
translation.ko: 저 똥꾸 녀석! 정말 얄미운 놈이야!

translation.en: I could never win without the town of Greasepit backin' me up!
translation.ko: 여러분의 응원 덕에 이길 수 있었습니다!

translation.en: -I love you all! -[Mr. Weaselbrat] And we love you!
Even you, Handsome Joe!
Here ya go, Auntie Uncle.
That'll keep Thunderstruck Trucking open for another few weeks.
translation.ko: 썬더스트럭 트러킹을 몇 주 더 운영할 수 있겠네요

translation.en: So don't go wastin' all that money.
Of course I won't waste it.
Hey, everyone, party's on me!
No matter.
Once I win next week's prize, she'll be just fine.
Now, how we celebratin' this win?
I got three words for you.
Pretzel. Factory. Dumpster.
Well, I got three words for you.
Yes. Yes. And all right!
[both] Ka-Boom!
If we could just make everyone hate Buddy so much
that they run him out of town, then he wouldn't race.
translation.ko: 마을에서 쫓겨나 경주를 못 하게 된다면

translation.en: And then he'd be broke.
And then he'd have to sell me Thunderstruck Trucking. [laughs]
translation.ko: 그럼 썬더스트럭 트러킹을 내게 팔게 될 텐데!

translation.en: Yo, and then I could finally win,
get my own trophy, and look just like Buddy!
You'd look just like a Buddy everyone hates.
Say, that's not a bad idea.
-[engine sputters] -Yo, Pops, it's Buddy.
Let's ask him to make his fans really mad for us.
translation.ko: 팬들을 열 받게 하라고 부탁해 보죠

translation.en: You ninny, that's not the real Buddy.
Howdy, Big Tex. I'm ready to ruin Buddy's reputation
just like we discussed in our text messages.
You're the guy I done hired?
Ain't no way anybody's gonna believe you're Buddy Thunderstruck.
-[tires screech] -[laughs] Buddy Thunderstruck!
Oh, wow! Can I buy you lunch?
[laughs] Well, this plan just might work after all.
Truckin' may not be as excitin' as racin',
but someone out there is depending on this load of baby-sized adult diapers,
and I will not let them down.
I just won't.
With good Buddy out of town, I can go be bad Buddy.
translation.ko: 착한 버디가 없을 때 나쁜 버디 행세를 하는 거야

translation.en: Buddy! My presents!
[imitating baby possum] "Buddy, my presents!
I'm a snotty crybaby who eats garbage. Wah!"
You're stupid, and so is your stupid bank.
Stupid? I'm callin' the cops!
Cool. Buddy customized my bike.
translation.ko: 좋아, 버디가 내 오토바이를 손봐 주다니

translation.en: Not cool, Buddy!
-[both grunting] -I done made you handsomer. [laughs]
I just customized your butt crack.
-[farts] -Gas. Have some ice cream.
[all] Curse you, Buddy Thunderstruck!
[Buddy] Ooh, boy. I just love coming home after a delivery.
translation.ko: 배달 끝나고 돌아올 때가 제일 좋아

translation.en: 'Cause nothing in Greasepit ever changes.
You ruined Greasepit, Buddy!
I ruined Greasepit?
We hate you, Buddy. You're such a jerk, man.
Hate me?
Darnell, did we accidentally cross into an alternate evil dimension?
translation.ko: 우리가 실수로 악의 세계로 넘어온 건가?

translation.en: It's possible. I mean, we both fell asleep on the drive back.
translation.ko: 그럴 수도 있지 아까 둘 다 잠들었잖아

translation.en: That's it! We're still asleep. We gotta hit each other to wake up.
translation.ko: 그래, 아직 꿈인 거야 서로 때려서 깨워야 해

translation.en: [Darnell] Nope, not dreaming.
-We don't need you. -We don't want you here no more!
[Mr. Weaselbrat] Get out of town, Buddy!
Okay, we're gone, man.
[Mr. Weaselbrat] I'm tired of you being around this place.
[Artichoke] Hasta, Luigi!
Darnell, I got no idea what's goin' on.
But if we wanna figure it out, that means we need...
[both] Truck stop snacks!
Okay, I'll get cheese gobs, sugar blisters and butter pops.
translation.ko: 그럼 치즈랑 설탕 과자 버터 소다 챙겨 올게

translation.en: Get some healthy stuff, too. Like carrots dipped in fudge.
translation.ko: 건강식도 챙겨 설탕 절임 당근 같은 거

translation.en: Now give me all your money, or I'm gonna suplex these here lotto tickets.
translation.ko: 이 복권들 흩뿌리기 전에 있는 돈 다 내놔!

translation.en: Well, Darnell, it looks like I still got me one fan.
translation.ko: 다넬, 내 팬이 한 명 남은 것 같아

translation.en: Hey, man. You got my clothes just right.
Why don't you come with us so you can tell me how great I am?
translation.ko: 같이 가서 오해 좀 풀어 줘요

translation.en: Oh, no. [grunts]
Hey, karate chop on the shoulder just ain't cool--
translation.ko: 이봐, 그 가라테 기술은 어깨에 넣는 게 아냐

translation.en: Well, that was a delayed reaction.
-[Jacko grunts] -Buddy, I think that guy
is pretending to be you and making you look bad all over town!
translation.ko: 네 행세를 하면서 나쁜 짓을 하는 것 같아!

translation.en: Hey. You're right. He tarnished my reputation
translation.ko: 네 말이 맞아 내 평판을 망치고

translation.en: and mopped the floor with my good name.
[Buddy] Hey, me, get back here!
-Ooh, that hurts a little bit. -[grunts]
Let's get that impostor.
Aw, shoot. We forgot the...
[both] Truck stop snacks!
I'm on it.
This is highly inconvenient,
but I just love me some truck stop snacks. [gasps]
-[groans] -We've been lookin' for you.
You caused all sorts of trouble. [laughs]
[Nick on TV] Again, Buddy's a no-show.
But nobody cares!
If you're still one of Buddy's racer chasers,
then come see me for a kick in the giblets.
translation.ko: 나한테 와서 한 대 맞고 가요

translation.en: Aw. You sad about missing your first race ever
since I finally got your butt in jail?
I done finally caught me Buddy Thunderstruck!
translation.ko: 드디어 이 몸이 버디 썬더스트럭을 잡았다!

translation.en: [sighs] My reputation is ruined.
translation.ko: 드디어 이 몸이 버디 썬더스트럭을 잡았다! 내 명성이 무너졌어

translation.en: Worse, if I don't win tonight's race money,
Big Tex will surely get the deed to Thunderstruck Trucking.
translation.ko: 빅 텍스가 우리 가게를 손에 넣고 말 거야

translation.en: Game over, man.
Hmm. Maybe it's not.
Ha! Where'd you learn to dance?
-[music stops] -We took a hip-hop audio course. Why?
translation.ko: 힙합 오디오 수업을 들었지 그건 왜?

translation.en: 'Cause we're way better. [chuckles] Way better.
translation.ko: 우리가 훨씬 낫거든요 비교도 안 되죠

translation.en: [laughs] Prove it! I'll bet you stink.
Okay, then. Get your apology ready.
Darnell, let's bust a move.
Wow, they really are better.
Yes, they are.
I'll have to apologize when they come back in.
They might be dancing outside.
My boy's in the lead! Whoo-wee!
Thunderstruck Trucking will soon be mine! -[horn honking] -[gasps]
translation.ko: 썬더스트럭 트러킹은 곧 내 차지가 될 거야!

translation.en: [both] Ka-Boom!
Man, everyone still thinks they hate me?
Get in that race and take him out! Buddy Thunderstruck can't win!
translation.ko: 어서 놈을 쫓아내! 우승하게 둘 순 없어!

translation.en: Hold up! Two Buddys on the track?
One must be real and the other must be a fake.
But which is which? They're completely identical!
It doesn't get more exciting or more confusing than this, folks!
Time to be awesome and win everybody's love back. Boom!
[grunting] What in blazes? -Blame it on the thunder! -[exclaims]
[Nick] They're approaching the finish line! Yo, yo, yo. No, no, no!
[Nick] It's gonna be a close one!
-[crowd cheering] -[laughs] Buddy's back!
Fart nugget! -Yeah! -[cheering continues]
Well, I'll be! [nervous chuckle] Buddy has himself an evil double.
Oh, looks just like him, too.
Cuff him, Hoisenberry.
You're busted.
That man was an impostor!
I'd never hurt y'all! I love everyone in Greasepit!
translation.ko: 전 여러분을 괴롭히지 않아요 모두를 사랑하죠

translation.en: Especially you, Handsome Joe.
[chanting] Buddy!
[Nick over PA] Buddy won first and second place. It's a new record!
This will keep Thunderstruck Trucking open for some time.
Good to be king again.
Excuse me, Sheriff. [laughs] Oops.
I hate me some Buddy Thunderstruck.
[Buddy and Darnell] Ka-Boom!
Oh, excuse me, sir, but you seem to be new in town.
translation.ko: 저기, 우리 마을에 처음 오신 것 같은데

translation.en: Oh, I look forward to hearing your story,
which appears to be quite mysterious and very intriguing.
Oh, wait, wait, wait. Hold that thought.
I'm late for din-din. Good night!
[Nick over PA] And Buddy Thunderstruck is going faster than ever!
Is he trying to win the love of a girl?
Did he make a promise to a sick child?
Just what is his secret motivation?
I am starving.
I could really go for some hot wings, like, now.
Me too. My stomach won't stop growling no matter how many times I punch it.
[grunting] Faster, Buddy.
translation.ko: 나도야, 아무리 때려도 배가 꼬르륵거려 더 빨리!

translation.en: It's Flossie Trophydash.
He is fast, but he ain't faster than me.
I think Flossie's a lady.
If you don't back off, you will not like what's coming, mister racer!
It's been well-established that Flossie is a woman.
This dude is about to get thunderstruck! Boom!
[Buddy] Blame it on the thunder.
[Buddy and Darnell] Ka-Boom!
Muncie Thunderstruck, my greatest fan and my greatest cousin.
translation.ko: 내 최고의 팬이자 최고의 사촌인 먼시!

translation.en: Your only cousin.
-What about cousin Zeke? -When you were a child,
translation.ko: 지크는? 지크는 네 어릴 적 상상의 친구였다고

translation.en: cousin Zeke was your imaginary friend.
translation.ko: 지크는 네 어릴 적 상상의 친구였다고

translation.en: He's still family. I ain't seen him in years, though.
translation.ko: 그래도 가족이야 몇 년째 못 봤지만

translation.en: See ya inside, cuz!
Your cousin's truck looks familiar.
Like we just saw it somewhere.
Oh, well. Who cares? Come on!
Hey, anyone seen a winner?
-[all cheering] -Hey, nice shoes.
Look just like mine, only a bit older, a little bit less expensive.
translation.ko: 제 신발 비슷한데 살짝 더 낡고 싸 보여요

translation.en: And here's your coffee, sugar.
-Hey, that's mine, jerk! [grunts] -Oh!
Now, now, boys. What did I tell ya about fighting?
It's wrong?
[chuckles] Heck, no. Fighting's great!
Just don't do it in my restaurant.
There you go.
Uh, where did all this pizza come from?
Prompt service and great soy vanilla non-fat lattes!
Okay, I ate too many hot wings.
They ain't arrived yet.
I'm just thinking of what I'll say afterwards.
I might say, "Rubber baby buggy bumpers." Real fast like.
Oh, great win tonight, cousin!
And thanks for celebratin' at my place. [chuckles]
Someday, when I get the money, it'll be even better.
translation.ko: 돈을 내주면 훨씬 더 좋을 텐데

translation.en: -[clattering] -Hey, you guys. Cut it out!
[Mr. Weaselbrat] Wow, talk about fast.
The fastest I've ever seen!
[laughs] Why, yes, I am.
translation.ko: 그렇게 빠른 건 처음 봤어! 제가 빠르긴 하죠

translation.en: And if it'd make your day,
I'll let you buy me a foofy coffee drink and massage my boots.
translation.ko: 제가 커피를 마셔드리고 신발도 만지게 해 드리죠

translation.en: [slurps] Oh, that's nice.
Actually, Buddy, we were talking about the new pizza place that delivers.
translation.ko: 사실 새 피자 가게 배달이 빠르단 거였어

translation.en: Beaver Dam Fast Pizza.
No one is faster than them.
[muffled] Their pizza's a little tough, but who cares? They're fast!
translation.ko: 피자가 좀 딱딱하지만 뭐 어때? 빠르잖아!

translation.en: [chuckles] Sorry, but no one's faster than me.
I don't know, Buddy, you're fast, but you're not Beaver Dam fast.
Hey, there they are!
Hi, I'm local celebrity Buddy Thunderstruck.
-[chomping] -The fastest around. Never lost a race.
translation.ko: 누구보다 빠르고 경주에서 진 적이 없죠

translation.en: -What do you guys drive? -[grunts]
[scoffs] Your van's about as aerodynamic as a brick.
-[tires screech] -Hmm, that's a quick brick.
Hey, Darnell, how can someone be faster than me at anything?
translation.ko: 다넬, 어떻게 나보다 빠를 수가 있을까?

translation.en: Maybe they're from the same alien planet as you.
translation.ko: 너랑 똑같은 외계 행성에서 왔나 보지

translation.en: -[tires skidding] -There's them beavers!
Dang! Them beavers is fast!
translation.ko: 맙소사! 엄청 빠르군! “버디 팬의 집 우르르 쾅! 그리스핏”

translation.en: [muffled] A little oaky, but fast.
How about a race? Winner gets dinner with Buddy Thunderstruck.
translation.ko: 경주 어때요? 이기면 이 몸이 함께 식사를 해 주죠

translation.en: Okay, dinner and a movie.
[chuckles] Yeah. You're going down. Shoot!
Darnell, I don't think these guys wanna race.
translation.ko: 저들은 경주할 생각이 없는 것 같아

translation.en: -Come on, I thought we was racing. -[doorbell rings]
If they won't race me, I need another way to prove to everyone that I'm the fastest.
translation.ko: 그렇다면 다른 방법으로 내가 더 빠른 걸 증명해야 해

translation.en: [laughs] You want the Concho Bolo to start delivering pizzas?
No, no, no, no!
Uh, well, today is Opposite Day, so that's a yes. Thank you.
translation.ko: 오늘은 청개구리 날이니까 동의한 거로 알게, 고마워

translation.en: Stop sayin' stupid things!
Opposite Day. Thus, you want me to continue sayin' smart things.
translation.ko: 청개구리 날이니까 현명한 소리 계속하란 거지?

translation.en: Like my pizza idea. Okay, I shall.
There is no Opposite Day!
Look. Your food sales have disappeared
translation.ko: 봐, 네 음식이 안 팔리는 건

translation.en: 'cause everyone now eats Beaver Dam Fast Pizza.
translation.ko: 다들 ‘비버 짱 빨라 피자’를 먹어서 그래

translation.en: Real fried onions.
Now picture it! Thunderstruck Pizza!
The greatest, fastest pizza in town!
Prepared with love by hometown favorite Muncie herself.
translation.ko: 먼시의 애정이 담긴 가장 빠른 피자!

translation.en: Hmm. I mean, I could put all sorts of toppings on my pizzas.
-Like pepperoni! -Nah, I don't like pepperoni.
Hey, y'all wanna eat some Thunderstruck Pizza?
-Oh! -See? They love the idea.
Business has gotten worse, and this could be fun, so...
translation.ko: 마침 장사도 안되고 재밌을 것 같으니...

translation.en: Okay, you got it.
[both] Ka-Boom!
When those stupid beavers see we're faster,
those stupid beavers are just gonna feel dumb.
translation.ko: 그 비버들은 바보가 된 기분일 거야

translation.en: They're probably gonna cry like this...
[imitating beaver] "Wah! I'm so stupid! I'm a beaver. Wah!"
"Oh, I'm a dumb beaver. I don't know what I'm doing."
[normal] I gotta admit, Darnell, your fake crying is just fantastic.
I practice. A lot. Hey, we're there!
Hey! You ordered from us. Why'd you order from them, too?
translation.ko: 우리한테 주문해 놓고 왜 저쪽에도 시켰어요?

translation.en: Because you took long.
They only beat me by one second!
Yeah, they're fast.
Tastes like a lumber yard.
I cannot be beaten by something as stupid as a pizza delivery beaver!
translation.ko: 그깟 비버 피자 배달부한테 질 수는 없어!

translation.en: We gotta keep trying!
I'm outta here!
You're weird, man!
Ninja star pizza boxes?
Hey! Where's my breadsticks?
-[Buddy and Nick grunt] -Cool!
Fart nugget!
I ain't quitting yet, you mangy beavers.
I refuse to lose!
Okay, I lost.
I lost bad.
It seems I have no choice but to freeze myself
so I might wake up in a better, brighter future.
translation.ko: 더 멋진 미래에 깨어나는 수밖에 없겠어

translation.en: Unfreeze me before you die of old age.
So as we can say goodbye and I can meet your children,
translation.ko: 작별 인사도 하고 네 자식들도 보게

translation.en: Buddy Number One, Buddy Number Two and Buddy Number Three. [cries]
translation.ko: 첫째 버디, 둘째 버디 셋째 버디

translation.en: Slow up. What was that last one?
Shoot. Let's just get it over with.
See ya in the future, man.
Yow! Cold! Cold, man! Hold on, Darnell.
The shock of that ice hittin' my giblets
got my brain into thinkin' up an idea.
No, it's gone.
[gasps] Whoa! Okay, the idea came back.
Thanks, Darnell. Come on.
-[rustling] -If we can find out
why they're so fast, then we can copy it.
translation.ko: 속도 비결을 알아내서 따라 하는 거야

translation.en: I just hope the secret ain't magic. I am no good at magic.
translation.ko: 마법은 아니면 좋겠다 마법엔 소질 없거든

translation.en: Their pizza's made from woodchips?
[chuckles] Their customers would hate to hear that.
translation.ko: 고객들한테 일러 주면 난리 날 거야

translation.en: Well, maybe I shouldn't.
Yeah, of course I should.
[Buddy over speaker] Attention, Greasepit!
Your Beaver Dam Fast pizzas are made from woodchips.
translation.ko: ‘비버 짱 빨라 피자’는 톱밥으로 만든 겁니다!

translation.en: What kind of woodchips?
From trees. That's right. Your gut's full of wood, dude.
translation.ko: 나무에서 나온 거요! 아저씬 나무를 먹은 거예요!

translation.en: Not cool.
I ain't eating this pizza ever again!
translation.ko: 이 피자는 다신 입에도 안 대겠어!

translation.en: [Buddy] Whoo-hoo! I'm back on top, baby! I'm number one!
Aw, look at their sad, little beaver faces.
translation.ko: 저 풀죽은 비버 얼굴 좀 봐

translation.en: Poor guys. Okay, I feel weird now.
To the Bolo!
-[whines] -Don't you worry, Muncie.
Customers will be coming in any minute.
No, they won't. Your pizza delivery idea was an epic fail.
translation.ko: 그럴 일 없어 배달 계획은 대실패야!

translation.en: Now I'm broke and have to close the Concho Bolo forever.
translation.ko: 이제 파산해서 가게를 영영 닫게 생겼어

translation.en: Oh, Muncie. I'm sorry.
My silly rivalry has blinded me to your plight.
translation.ko: 내가 경쟁에 눈이 멀어 네 어려움을 몰랐어

translation.en: But I know how to make things right.
Darnell, grab the ice.
We'll freeze Muncie so she can wake up in a better, brighter future.
Now I'll never turn this tiny, crummy dump into a bigger, better dump!
translation.ko: 이 초라한 가게를 멋지게 만들지 못할 거야

translation.en: Man, I just keep thinking of those sad and stupefied beaver faces.
translation.ko: 계속 그 비버들의 풀죽은 표정이 생각나

translation.en: -Me too. -[beavers crying]
Their faces are kinda like Muncie's sad and stupefied face.
translation.ko: 풀죽은 비버들이랑 방금 먼시 얼굴이 똑같았어

translation.en: -Aw, man. -[Muncie crying]
translation.ko: 풀죽은 비버들이랑 방금 먼시 얼굴이 똑같았어 맙소사

translation.en: Now your face looks sad and stupefied.
[voice breaking] Yeah. And guess what?
Mine's sad and stupefied!
I got an idea!
Oh, Buddy, you know what?
[laughs] I'm really not in the mood to go anywhere.
translation.ko: 버디, 있잖아 나 지금 어디 갈 기분 아냐

translation.en: Just trust me, cuz.
Listen, I am so sorry that I-- Hey! I have to talk to you!
translation.ko: 저기, 정말 미안했... 할 얘기가 있다고!

translation.en: No, you don't, you crazy little beavers. -Boom! -[electricity crackling]
Now, you listen. I hurt someone I love.
translation.ko: 내 말 들어 봐 난 사랑하는 사람과

translation.en: Also, you mangy beavers.
Admit it. Your pizza is terrible! Ugh!
But Muncie's pizzas are amazing.
However, you are faster than me at delivering.
Kudos to you and your remarkable van.
Come with me. I think I can help.
Beaver Dam Thunderstruck Pizza's a hit!
[Buddy] Well, I didn't beat them beavers at racin',
but Muncie's happy, and that's all that matters.
Actually, Buddy, during the chase,
translation.ko: 하지만 버디 아까 비버들을 쫓을 때

translation.en: in order to stop the beavers, you had to pass them.
And you did. So I guess you won.
translation.ko: 추월했다는 건 네가 더 빨랐다는 거야

translation.en: Hey, how about that?
I did beat them mangy beavers. Let's party!
